segments.text: You say your products are aimed at the green consumer . In what ways are they environmentally-friendly ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We produce household cleaning products - detergents and so on . They are all phosphate-free , which minimises damage to the environment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We try to use as little packaging as possible . Also , all our bottles are made of recyclable plastic and we use recycled fibre in our boxes . That's what our customers want .
segments.speaker: S2
